short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Winners will be drawn from replies, retweets, likes on Twitter (x.com) tweets.
short.zh_TW: 從 Twitter (x.com) 推文的回覆、轉發、喜歡中抽出得獎者。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step.1 Enter the tweet link of the specified tweet and set the source of the lottery list, such as: comments, retweets, and likes.
Step.2 After automatically loading the information, confirm the list and qualifications.
Step.3 Draw the winner.

v1.2 (2024-12)
Add a new setting item.

v1.1 (2024-09)
Fix bug.

v1.0 (2024-02)
Create new extensions.
long.zh_TW:
Step.1 輸入指定推文的推文連結，並設定抽獎名單來源，如：留言、轉發、喜歡。
Step.2 自動載入資料後，確認名單與資格。
Step.3 抽出優勝者。

v1.2 (2024-12)
Add a new setting item.

v1.1 (2024-09)
Fix bug.

v1.0 (2024-02)
Create new extensions.
